575020.name: Outerra World Sandbox
575020.description:
Overview

Outerra World Sandbox lets you play and create the world that you want. It uses multiple data sources to populate the earth’s terrain, roads, buildings, forests, and waterways. It’s up to you to see where it goes from there.

Explore

Walk, Drive, Sail, Fly or Freecam to anywhere on earth.



  • The peak of Everest
  • The deepest depths of the Mariana Trench
  • The Sahara Desert
If it is a place on earth that's on your bucket list, you can go there. Plan your dream trip hopping between multiple vehicles across different terrain types. Enjoy the vistas, from land, sea, and sky.

Create

Mold the world following a fantasy or a serious project you have in mind.



  • Refine the terrain, and place structures
  • Import Vehicles, structures, and other assets
  • Import hi-res terrain imagery insets and elevation insets

Do you want to walk the streets of Paris in the 1930s? Or maybe sculpt New York City at the turn of the 20th century? You can even reimagine landscapes of the earth before they were developed by humankind.

Share

Share your creations via the steam workshop and contribute to an ever-changing world with your own vision.
575020.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 斯洛伐克语
